actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to establish within the Department of State a Bureau of Claims Against Foreign Diplomats with responsibility for awarding full and just compensation to persons injured by foreign diplomats and for reimbursing local governments for revenues lost because of their inability to collect parking fines from foreign diplomats.

summary.text: Establishes a Bureau of Claims Against Foreign Diplomats within the Department of State to award compensation to persons injured by foreign diplomats and to reimburse local governments for revenues lost because of their inability to collect parking fines from foreign diplomats.

titles.title: A bill to establish within the Department of State a Bureau of Claims Against Foreign Diplomats with responsibility for awarding full and just compensation to persons injured by foreign diplomats and for reimbursing local governments for revenues lost because of their inability to collect parking fines from foreign diplomats.
